version_description:
THE BLACK DRAGON UPDATE

TIER ADVANCEMENT IMPROVEMENTS!
• New Tier 3 - OPERATION BLACK DRAGON added with 56 combat & 8 priority missions
• Get VIP REWARDS for 100% Tier Completion

HD ENVIRONMENT ENHANCEMENTS
Play in enhanced combat environments and experience console-quality visual features [only on high-end devices]:
• Rain
• Thunder & lightning
• Dust storm
• Clouds
• Ocean & waves

STORE IMPROVEMENTS
Get Exclusive Deals, Packs & Weapons Inventory right from the Map Screen

PVP & GRAPHICS ENHANCEMENTS!
• New NIGHT Mode in PvP
• Enhanced GAMEPLAY & multiple GRAPHIC IMPROVEMENTS

NEW PvP MISSION
Raid enemy bases on land in new and action-packed versus battles.

EXCITING iOS 10 FEATURES
Experience the new Replay Kit Broadcasting, 3D Touch and more.

ENHANCED UPGRADE SCREEN
Upgrade Screen improved to display progress path.

MAP SCREEN VISUAL IMPROVEMENTS
Choose combat wisely with missions requiring more power rating marked as red, on global map.
